projects.title: The Halloween Quiz
projects.description: A dynamic quiz game utilizing Zustand for state management in a React application. This interactive game offers users a series of multiple-choice questions, where they can select their answers. React Router Dom has also been utilized for moving the user between different pages. Accessibility has also been central.

projects.title: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: A React project focused on state management, API interactions for fetching and posting data. Features include a design-aligned UI, sorted thought display by recency, like count for each thought, a form for new thoughts, and a like functionality.

projects.title: Adopt a Cat
projects.description: A React project to create a customizable survey form. Focus on React state and form control. After submission, users see a summary. Design is flexible but should prioritise accessibility.

projects.title: Dog Fact
projects.description: A simple React app utilising the useEffect hook to fetch and display Dog Facts from an external API.
